post:
Good Day, everyone.

Carstensz Pyramid Server have a good news for you. Now we are offering some new low end box KVM plans located in our Dallas node. Our new plans detailed below :

KVM-512
512MB Memory
2 vCore
15GB HDD
500GB Bandwidth
14.40 USD/quarterly

KVM-1G
1GB Memory
2 vCore
25GB HDD
1000GB Bandwidth
6.90 USD/month

Control Panel : SolusVM
Virtualization : KVM
IPv4 : 1
IPv6 : Isn't ready yet
Location : Dallas, Texas
Payment : Paypal (global) & Bank Transfer (for Indonesian clients)

<a href="https://pyramidserver.com/clients/cart.php?gid=27&currency=2">ORDER NOW</a>

Contact us if you need an IP test and stock availability.

Here's our node details :
E3-1230(v2)
32GB DDR3 ECC
4 x HDD raid10
1gbps blend premium bw.

Some restrictions included : 
Allowed : PRIVATE Proxy/VPN/SSH Tunnel, game server, all legal content/activity.
Not Allowed : OPEN/SHARED/PUBLIC Proxy/VPN/SSH Tunnel, IRC Client/Server/Bouncer, all illegal stuff. (Instant termination without refund for an abusive clients)

We were taking over Regolith Media's US VPS business a couple weeks ago, this are where the servers came from.
If you an Ex -Regolith Media's client and still haven't registered to us please raise a ticket to our sales department with the subject : Regolith Media Invoice #XXXX

Invoice #XXXX = Your last/current active invoice.
